properties.areaDesc: Early, GA; Miller, GA; Decatur, GA; Seminole, GA; Jackson, FL
properties.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued January 11 at 7:43PM EST until January 11 at 8:30PM EST by NWS Tallahassee FL
properties.description:
The National Weather Service in Tallahassee has issued a

* Severe Thunderstorm Warning for...
Northeastern Jackson County in the Panhandle of Florida...
Western Decatur County in southwestern Georgia...
Southwestern Miller County in southwestern Georgia...
Southern Early County in southwestern Georgia...
Seminole County in Southwestern Georgia...

* Until 830 PM EST/730 PM CST/.

* At 742 PM EST/642 PM CST/, a severe thunderstorm was located 13
miles southwest of Donalsonville, moving northeast at 35 mph.

HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts.

SOURCE...Radar indicated.

IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees.

* Locations impacted include...
Colquitt, Donalsonville, Bainbridge, Chattahoochee, Sneads, Grand
Ridge, Iron City, Brinson, Jakin, Hanover, Ausmac, Reynoldsville,
Little Hope, Mayhaw, Decatur Co A/P, Lovedale, Boykin, Dellwood,
Riverturn and Sharphagen.
properties.instruction:
A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 900 PM EST/800 PM CST/ for
the Panhandle of Florida...and southwestern Georgia.

A Tornado Watch remains in effect for the warned area. Tornadoes can
develop quickly from severe thunderstorms. Although a tornado is not
immediately likely, if one is spotted, act quickly and move to a
place of safety inside a sturdy structure such as a basement or small
interior room.

For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a
building.
